properties.name: Torres del Paine
properties.description: Patagonia's crown jewel with granite towers, glaciers, and turquoise lakes

properties.name: Atacama Desert
properties.description: Driest desert on Earth with moon valleys, geysers, and world's clearest night skies

properties.name: Easter Island (Rapa Nui)
properties.description: Remote Pacific island with mysterious Moai stone statues, UNESCO World Heritage

properties.name: Carretera Austral
properties.description: 1,200km scenic route through pristine Patagonian wilderness

properties.name: Grey Glacier
properties.description: Massive glacier in Torres del Paine with boat access to iceberg-filled lake

properties.name: Marble Caves (Catedral de Marmol)
properties.description: Swirling blue marble formations on General Carrera Lake

properties.name: San Pedro de Atacama
properties.description: Gateway to Atacama with Valle de la Luna offering Mars-like sunset views

properties.name: Cape Horn
properties.description: Southernmost headland of South America's Tierra del Fuego archipelago

properties.name: Valparaiso
properties.description: UNESCO port city with colorful hillside neighborhoods and historic funiculars

properties.name: El Tatio Geysers
properties.description: One of world's largest geyser fields at 4,320m elevation

properties.name: Chiloe Island
properties.description: Magical island with UNESCO wooden churches and palafito stilt houses
